title: Magnetic and structural characteristics associated with the transformation of As(V)-coprecipitated ferrihydrite to hematite: Implications for magnetic enhancement in soils and sediments
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00739A, Paper
Guoqing Zhang, Yixuan Tang, Jinru Lin, Jiaxing Xu, Zidan Yuan, Lingyun Chen, Fei Wu, Chengshuai Liu, Zongmin Zhu, Xiangyang Bi, Wei Zou, Zhiguo Cao, Kai Jiang, Yuanming Pan, Roman Chernikov, Yongfeng Jia, Shaofeng Wang
The transformation of metastable ferrihydrite to stable hematite has been linked to the magnetic enhancement in soils and sediments. However, the magnetic and structural characteristics associated with the transformation of...
